title: 绝美之地：新西兰
content:
来自: dongxi.net – FeedzShare  

发布时间:2010年08月25日,  已有 5 人推荐

近日，英文先驱报举行了“新西兰美景”摄影比赛，有超过8000张作品的投稿，现在选出了12张，请大家一起来欣赏世界最后天堂的超级美景。

First place winner. Mt Egmont/Taranaki from the Pouakai ranges.
Photo / Jeremy Beckers

Second place. Beautiful Kerosene Creek. Photo / Malcolm White

Third place. Mt Taranaki. Photo / Tim Wilton

Mt Taranaki. Photo / Andrew Beswick

Cornwallis Wharf, West Auckland. Photo / Steve Turner

Sand Dunes of Te Paki, Northland. Photo / Karen Williamson

The Jetty on Lake Mapourika on the West Coast, shortly after dawn
on a crisp, clear, sunny day.
Photo / Vineet Rajasekhar

On the road to Glenorchy (Lake Wakatipu). Photo / Ian Lawlor

View from Mount Roy, Lake Wanaka. Photo / Pascal Languillon

Hiking Franz Josef. Photo / Helen Hayhurst

Te Rewa Rewa bridge sunset. Photo / Margret Brands

Sunrise at Cathedral Cove, Coromandel. Photo / Harley Betts

“要翻墙，用赛风”.
